question:
Consider the following statements about All India Trade Union Congress (AITUC):
  1. It was founded by Lala Lajpat Rai 
  2. It has been associated with the Communist Party of India since Independence
  3. AITUC is a founder member of the World Federation of Trade Unions
   Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: All India Trade Union Congress (AITUC) was founded on 31 October 1920 in Bombay by Lala Lajpat Rai. AITUC is a founder member of the World Federation of Trade Unions. It has been associated with the Communist Party of India since Independence.
